Skin and Connective Tissue Diseases/Skin Diseases/Facial Dermatoses/Acneiform Eruptions/Chloracne
Record.Description: ACNE-like skin eruptions caused by exposure to CHLORINE-containing compounds. Exposure can be by inhalation, ingestion, or through the skin. Chloracne is often seen in people who have occupational contact with chlorinated pesticides, wood preservatives, and sealants.
